Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/ntp/dist/libntp/octtoint.c

1/* $NetBSD: octtoint.c,v 1.7 2016/01/08 21:35:38 christos Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * octtoint - convert an ascii string in octal to an unsigned
5 * long, with error checking
6 */
7#include <config.h>
8#include <stdio.h>
9#include <ctype.h>
10
11#include "ntp_stdlib.h"
12
13int
14octtoint(
15 const char *str,
16 u_long *ival
17 )
18{
19 register u_long u;
20 register const char *cp;
21
22 cp = str;
23
24 if (*cp == '\0')
25 return 0;
26
27 u = 0;
28 while (*cp != '\0') {
29 if (!isdigit((unsigned char)*cp) || *cp == '8' || *cp == '9')
30 return 0;
31 if (u >= 0x20000000)
32 return 0; /* overflow */
33 u <<= 3;
34 u += *cp++ - '0'; /* ascii dependent */
35 }
36 *ival = u;
37 return 1;
38}
39
